articles.title: Target says it will spend more than $2 billion with Black-owned businesses by 2025 - CNBC
articles.description: Target joins a growing list of retailers that have made commitments to work with more Black-owned businesses and carry more of their merchandise.
articles.content: Target said it will hire more Black-owned companies, launch a program to identify and support promising minority entrepreneurs and add products from more than 500 Black-owned brands to its shelves or… [+3300 chars]
